verbs.description: There [V: ’s] [ARG1: a real movement afoot to make the Golden State its own golden republic] . At very least , it will galvanize opposition to the Trump regime .
There ’s [ARG0: a real movement afoot] to [V: make] [ARG1: the Golden State its own golden republic] . At very least , it will galvanize opposition to the Trump regime .
There ’s a real movement afoot to make the Golden State its own golden republic . At very least , it [V: will] galvanize opposition to the Trump regime .
There ’s a real movement afoot to make the Golden State its own golden republic . [ARGM-ADV: At very least] , [ARG0: it] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: galvanize] [ARG1: opposition to the Trump regime] .
